mutants.code:
import collections
import re

def word_dictionary(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    word_count = collections.Counter(words)
    word_dict = {word: {'Frequency': freq, 'Character count': len(word)} for (word, freq) in word_count.items()}
    return word_dict

import collections
import re

def word_dictionary(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9 ]+', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    word_count = collections.Counter(words)
    word_dict = {word: {'Frequency': freq, 'Character count': len(word)} for (word, freq) in word_count.items()}
    return word_dict

mutants.original_line: word_dict = {word: {'Frequency': freq, 'Character count': len(word)} for word, freq in word_count.items()}
mutants.mutated_line: word_dict = {word: {'': freq, 'Character count': len(word)} for (word, freq) in word_count.items()}

mutants.code:
import collections
import re

def word_dictionary(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9 ]+', '', sentence)
    words = sentence.lower().split()
    word_count = collections.Counter(words)
    word_dict = {word: {'Frequency': freq, '': len(word)} for (word, freq) in word_count.items()}
    return word_dict
